attributes.action: Nigel Farage  should take control of Britain's exit from the EU in Brussels
attributes.background:
Nigel Farage should be at the head of the table when negotiating terms  for exit of  the EU.
After all the hard work and campaigning he's done for the British public and sitting on the seat around the EU table who better to do it for us a man that has stood up for the working class of this country
